rules.description: Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Post escape if left_control is pressed alone.
左コマンドキーを単体で押したときに英数・2回連打したときにかなキーを送信する
Right command with middle to number
HHKB Arrow Mode (fn + semicolon/slash/open_bracket/quote to arrow keys, etc)
HHKB Media Key Mode (fn + asdf to Volume down/up/mute, eject) (rev 2)
Map fn + i, o, p  to F13, F14, F15.
Map Left Option plus h/j/k/l to Arrows
